evidence.text: Plaintiffs ... are immigrant youth under the age of 21 ... have applied for Special Immigrant Juvenile Status (SIJS) ... USCIS policy targeting youth who have reached the age of 18 ... denial ... violates the controlling statute and regulations.

evidence.source_document: Complaint - Class Action for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief
evidence.text: scores of other youth in Washington State face the same threat.

extracted.value: The plaintiffs are immigrant youth under 21 who applied for Special Immigrant Juvenile Status (SIJS) and were denied or faced delays under a new USCIS policy applied after they turned 18, violating statutory requirements for adjudication within 180 days.
